nl.inl.blacklab.externalstorage

Class ContentStoreDirAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.externalstorage.ContentStore
      • nl.inl.blacklab.externalstorage.ContentStoreDirAbstract
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentStoreDir, ContentStoreDirFixedBlock, ContentStoreDirUtf8

    public abstract class ContentStoreDirAbstract
extends ContentStore
    Store string content by id in a directory of compound files with a TOC file. Quickly retrieve (parts of) the string content.
